title: Intrested in finding duo partner for RANKED- Bronze/Silver
body:
Hello,
Thought I'd endeavour into a search, to buff up my friends list with players keen to duo queue in Bonze/Silver.

About my self; Currently in Bronze 1. My main role is support with a variety of champions listed>[Braum, Threash, Leona, Alistar, Annie, Fiddlesticks, Janna, Morgana, Sona, Soraka]. My style of play is adaptable for what's required and always looking to learn.

If your interested feel free to message me in game or inbox.
Thanks for reading, Zoki.

replies.body: if you're still looking for duo partner add me

Kewl I am..
ill add you np, thanks man.
Add me :) Im b3 atm. IGN is Moeyondabulk

Yeah, id be willing to climb i am b5 aswell i mostly top jg or adc
so add me
- Deep Sanity

Alright sweet, ill add you.
thanks.
